algorithm_technique: Two pointers and a lookup table for strobogrammatic digit pairs.
problem_summary_simple: Determine if a number looks the same when rotated 180 degrees.
problem_summary_technical: Uses two pointers to compare digits from both ends of the string against a strobogrammatic mapping.
key_insights: Only digits 0, 1, 8 are self-strobogrammatic; 6 and 9 are pairs.
The core idea is to check if the digit at index `i` is the strobogrammatic counterpart of the digit at index `n-1-i`.
